name: lmhmsca
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, clmhm, c2)), wceq(c3, c4))

stmt.origin: simprrd(wcel(c0, co(c1, clmhm, c2)), wceq(c3, c4), wa(wcel(c1, clmod), wcel(c2, clmod)), wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)))
stmt.pretty: simprrd(c0 ∈(c1[LMHom]c2), c3 = c4, (c1 ∈ LMod ∧ c2 ∈ LMod), c0 ∈(c1[GrpHom]c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, clmhm, c2)), wceq(c3, c4))
-| wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, clmhm, c2)), wa(wa(wcel(c1, clmod), wcel(c2, clmod)), wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wceq(c3, c4))))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈(c1[LMHom]c2)→ c3 = c4)
⊣ (c0 ∈(c1[LMHom]c2)→((c1 ∈ LMod ∧ c2 ∈ LMod)∧(c0 ∈(c1[GrpHom]c2)∧ c3 = c4)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, clmhm, c2)), wceq(c3, c4))
-| wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, clmhm, c2)), wa(wa(wcel(c1, clmod), wcel(c2, clmod)), wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wceq(c3, c4))))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈(c1[LMHom]c2)→ c3 = c4)
⊣ (c0 ∈(c1[LMHom]c2)→((c1 ∈ LMod ∧ c2 ∈ LMod)∧(c0 ∈(c1[GrpHom]c2)∧ c3 = c4)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, clmhm, c2)), wa(wa(wcel(c1, clmod), wcel(c2, clmod)), wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wceq(c3, c4))))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(csca, c1))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(csca, c2))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈(c1[LMHom]c2)→((c1 ∈ LMod ∧ c2 ∈ LMod)∧(c0 ∈(c1[GrpHom]c2)∧ c3 = c4)))
⊣ c4 =(Scalar ` c1)
⊣ c3 =(Scalar ` c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, clmhm, c2)), wceq(c3, c4))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(csca, c1))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(csca, c2))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈(c1[LMHom]c2)→ c3 = c4)
⊣ c4 =(Scalar ` c1)
⊣ c3 =(Scalar ` c2)

comment: A homomorphism of left modules constrains both modules to the same ring of scalars. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 1-Jan-2015.)
